property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: American contractors installing solar water heaters at an Afghan orphanage

note.text: In Afghanistan's relationship-oriented society, being trustworthy is important. Be sure not to commit to anything that you may not be able to follow through on, as it could damage your reputation.

Know what you can do and what you may not be able to do. In most cases, it's good practice to underpromise and overdeliver. Once you've earned a counterpart's trust, your good reputation will precede you with other people.
